src/serial/ll-dgr-src/init.f

00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Init
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00015

00031 
00032  SUBROUTINE Init
00033 
00034 ! Common Variables
00035  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00036  USE Domain
00037  USE FluidParams
00038  USE LBMParams
00039  IMPLICIT NONE
00040 
00041 ! Local Variables
00042  INTEGER :: i, j, m, ie, iw, jn, js, xs, ys
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: R, lapRho_f, gradRhoSqX_f, gradRhoSqY_f
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2_f, gradRhoXY2_f, gradRhoYX2_f, gradRhoYY2_f
00045 
00046 
00047 ! Initialize counters
00048  iStep = 0
00049  tCall = 1
00050  eps   = 1.0D0
00051 
00052 ! Define vtk limits
00053  NX   = xmax - xmin + 1
00054  NY   = ymax - ymin + 1
00055  NX_f = xmax_f - xmin_f + 1
00056  NY_f = ymax_f - ymin_f + 1
00057 
00058 
00059 !---------Near neighbors in the order parameter mesh ---------------------------
00060  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00061    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00062       ni_f(i,j,1) = i + 1
00063       ni_f(i,j,2) = j + 1
00064       ni_f(i,j,3) = i - 1
00065       ni_f(i,j,4) = j - 1
00066    END DO
00067  END DO
00068 ! Fix near neighbours at edges
00069  ni_f(xmin_f,:,3) = xmax_f
00070  ni_f(xmax_f,:,1) = xmin_f
00071  ni_f(:,ymin_f,4) = ymax_f
00072  ni_f(:,ymax_f,2) = ymin_f
00073 
00074 !---------Near neighbors in the momentum mesh ----------------------------------
00075  DO j = ymin, ymax
00076    DO i = xmin, xmax
00077      ni(i,j,1) = i + 1
00078      ni(i,j,2) = j + 1
00079      ni(i,j,3) = i - 1
00080      ni(i,j,4) = j - 1
00081    END DO
00082  END DO
00083 ! Fix near neighbours at edges
00084  ni(xmin,:,3) = xmax
00085  ni(xmax,:,1) = xmin
00086  ni(:,ymin,4) = ymax
00087  ni(:,ymax,2) = ymin
00088 
00089 
00090 !---------- Initialization for order parameter grid arrays ---------------------
00091  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00092    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00093 
00094 ! Initialize density rho
00095      rho_f(i,j) = rhoH
00096      DO m = 1, nBubbles
00097        R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i)-bubbles(m,1) )**2 + ( DBLE(j)-bubbles(m,2) )**2 )
00098        IF ( R <= (DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) + IntWidth) ) THEN
00099           rho_f(i,j) = rhoStar - 0.5*(rhoH - rhoL)*TANH( 2.D0*( DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) - R )/IntWidth )
00100        END IF
00101      END DO
00102 
00103 ! Initialize velocity and pressure
00104      u_f(i,j,1) = 0.D0
00105      u_f(i,j,2) = 0.D0
00106      p_f(i,j)   = 1.D0
00107 
00108 ! Initialize the order parameter distribution function
00109      f(i,j,0  ) = W0*rho_f(i,j)
00110      f(i,j,1:4) = W1*rho_f(i,j)
00111      f(i,j,5:8) = W2*rho_f(i,j)
00112    END DO
00113  END DO
00114 
00115 !---------- Initialization for the momentum/pressure grid arrays ---------------
00116  DO j = ymin, ymax
00117    DO i = xmin, xmax
00118 
00119 ! Copy the value of rho from the overlapping f-mesh nodes
00120      xs = 2*i - 1
00121      ys = 2*j - 1
00122      rho(i,j) = rho_f(xs,ys)
00123 
00124 ! Define velocity and pressure
00125      u(i,j,1) = 0.D0
00126      u(i,j,2) = 0.D0
00127      p(i,j)   = 1.D0
00128 
00129 ! Equilibrium values of Gamma, and the phase and pressure distributions
00130      g(i,j,0  ) = W0C*p(i,j)
00131      g(i,j,1:4) = W1C*p(i,j)
00132      g(i,j,5:8) = W2C*p(i,j)
00133    END DO
00134  END DO
00135 
00136 
00137 !---------- Differential terms in order parameter grid (stress formulation) ----
00138  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00139    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00140 
00141 ! Identify first neighbors
00142      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00143      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00144      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00145      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00146 
00147 ! Gradient of the density rho
00148      gradRhoX_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho_f(ie,j ) - rho_f(iw,j ) ) + rho_f(ie,jn) &
00149                      - rho_f(iw,jn) + rho_f(ie,js) - rho_f(iw,js) )*inv12
00150 
00151      gradRhoY_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho_f(i ,jn) - rho_f(i ,js) ) + rho_f(ie,jn) &
00152                      - rho_f(ie,js) + rho_f(iw,jn) - rho_f(iw,js) )*inv12
00153 
00154 ! Square of the density gradient (components and full)
00155      gradRhoXX_f(i,j) = gradRhoX_f(i,j)*gradRhoX_f(i,j)
00156      gradRhoXY_f(i,j) = gradRhoX_f(i,j)*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00157      gradRhoYY_f(i,j) = gradRhoY_f(i,j)*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00158      gradRhoSq_f(i,j) = gradRhoXX_f(i,j) + gradRhoYY_f(i,j)
00159 
00160 ! Laplacian of the density rho
00161      lapRho_f = 4.D0*( rho_f(ie,j ) + rho_f(iw,j ) + rho_f(i ,jn) + rho_f(i ,js) ) &
00162               +  rho_f(ie,jn) + rho_f(ie,js) + rho_f(iw,jn) + rho_f(iw,js)         &
00163               - 20.D0*rho_f(i,j)
00164 
00165 ! Define Psi
00166      psi_f(i,j) = 4.D0*beta*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoStar )*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoL )*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoH ) &
00167                 - kappa_6*lapRho_f
00168 
00169    END DO
00170  END DO
00171 
00172 
00173 !---------- Interpolate differential terms in the momentum mesh ----------------
00174 ! 1/12 factor embedded in kappaEf
00175  DO j = ymin, ymax
00176    DO i = xmin, xmax
00177 
00178 ! Relative positions of the source nodes (overlapping nodes in f and g grids)
00179      xs = 2*i - 1
00180      ys = 2*j - 1
00181 
00182 ! Identify first neighbors
00183      ie = ni_f(xs,ys,1)
00184      jn = ni_f(xs,ys,2)
00185      iw = ni_f(xs,ys,3)
00186      js = ni_f(xs,ys,4)
00187 
00188 ! Gradient of the square of the density gradient
00189      gradRhoSqX_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,ys) ) &
00190                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,js)          &
00191                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,js) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,jn)
00192 
00193      gradRhoSqY_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(xs,js) ) &
00194                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,js)          &
00195                   + gradRhoSq_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(ie,js)
00196 
00197 ! Second derivatives of rho
00198      gradRhoXX2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,ys) ) &
00199                   + gradRhoXX_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,js)          &
00200                   + gradRhoXX_f(ie,js) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,jn)
00201 
00202      gradRhoXY2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(xs,js) ) &
00203                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,js)          &
00204                   + gradRhoXY_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(ie,js)
00205 
00206      gradRhoYX2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,ys) ) &
00207                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,js)          &
00208                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,js) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,jn)
00209 
00210      gradRhoYY2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(xs,js) ) &
00211                   + gradRhoYY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(iw,js)          &
00212                   + gradRhoYY_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(ie,js)
00213 
00214 ! Arrays necessary in preStream and postStream
00215      GX(i,j) = kappaEf*( gradRhoSqX_f - gradRhoXX2_f - gradRhoXY2_f )
00216      GY(i,j) = kappaEf*( gradRhoSqY_f - gradRhoYX2_f - gradRhoYY2_f )
00217 
00218 ! Copy and rescale values of the gradient of rho from the overlapping f-mesh nodes
00219      gradRhoX(i,j) = 2.D0*gradRhoX_f(xs,ys)
00220      gradRhoY(i,j) = 2.D0*gradRhoY_f(xs,ys)
00221 
00222    END DO
00223  END DO
00224 
00225 ! Save initialized data to file
00226  CALL Stats
00227  CALL VtkPlane
00228  
00229  RETURN
00230  END SUBROUTINE Init
00231
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:02:43 2008 for LL-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
